title: Giveaways Adcplz

embed.description: GIVEAWAYS - Starting with $10 > $25 > $50 How to win 1. Like this page 2. Share and like this post 3. Say what server you're playing in the comments (y) Up to next week 15 February 2015. I can give you a code to redeem in-game or send you via paypal.

body:
Hey, I thought I share this.

We're from OCE and creating a website and Facebook page.
You can like our page and participate on our giveaways, I might do one just for OCE weekly if we have a good amount of people.

The page is fb.com/adcplz

Thanks.

replies.body:
"We're from OCE"

"3. Say what server you play in the comments"

Yes, "we" as the one behind creating website and Facebook are from OCE.

But the participators can be from anywhere.
